review: We canceled our high priced dish service and use this along with an indoor hd antenna.  With Hulu plus and sling tv, we haven't missed our dish at all.  If you're looking for an easy way to watch television, this is it.  Even our 4 year old is able to navigate the amazon fire box.  The toughest part is that there's always something to watch.
